name: IRCCloud input box fixes V1
description: A more gentle approach to adjusting the text input box. Intended to be used with IRCCloud Web Panel.
additional_info:
While everything you need to know is explained in the code (as Stylus, it would render as the first section) all you need to know is this;
  • In IRCCloud's account settings, you should disable User Icons to provide yourself as much typing space as possible.
  • The default theme, Dawn uses box shadows which screws with how the input box looks, but also causes the entire right side to be active buttons you can accidentially click on. Because of this, changing the theme used in IRCCloud's account settings under Layout & Design is a good idea.
For a more extensive solution, don't install this. Check out version 2 of this style instead.
